thread.title: Raila Odinga's daughter admitted to city hospital
thread.title_full: Raila Odinga's daughter admitted to city hospital

title: Raila Odinga's daughter admitted to city hospital
text:
Raila Odinga's daughter admitted to city hospital Monday February 20 2017 Rosemary Odinga addressing residents in Marigat, Baringo County, on January 20,2017. She has been admitted to a city hospital after falling ill. PHOTO | CHEBOITE KIGEN | NATION MEDIA GROUP Advertisement More by this Author 
Cord leader Raila Odingaâ€™s daughter Rosemary has been admitted to a hospital in Nairobi. 
Although a member of the family confirmed that Ms Odinga was indeed in hospital, they did not reveal what could be ailing the political aspirant or when she was taken to hospital. 
Ms Odinga is in the race for the Kibra parliamentary seat, having made the announcement sometime in January.
